Text: I know that many of you, like me, are dead tired of torrents that are broken or mislabeled. It is my goal to provide a comment on all the torrents I download that includes any information that the original uploader omitted and also rates the torrent on overall quality using a simple five-point scale as well as any applicable virus, ad and spy-ware warnings.
ok so you just wanted to say that you wanted to comment on every torrent you dl?  You didn't really say much about the torrent besides the fact that your downloading it.
also for wanting to add "omitted" info i don't see that your even uploading any torrents of your own to share out.
sevir you seem a little confused im assuming...anywaiz i hope this torrent is actually complete

@ Infamouzx - LEGIT mp3's can't contain viruses.  But since you can't preview them in like quicktime or something on your browser, it's possible that they aren't actually mp3 SONGS.  Paranoid, but true.
